Definition: Proportion of the hunting ground (terrestrial area) covered by forests 80 years-old and older.
Source: Photointerpreted ecoforest map, Quebec (Canada), 4th decennal updated in 2015
Reference: Berger, J.-P., A. Leboeuf, and I. Pomerleau. 2015. Norme de stratification écoforestière - Quatrième inventaire écoforestier du Québec méridional. Québec.
Query: CL_AGE = '12090' OR "CL_AGE" = '120' OR "CL_AGE" = '90' OR "CL_AGE" = '9090' OR "CL_AGE" = '90120' OR "CL_AGE" = 'VIN' OR "CL_AGE" = 'VIR'

Definition: Proportion of the hunting ground (terrestrial area) covered by forests 10 years-old and younger.
Source: Photointerpreted ecoforest map, Quebec (Canada), 4th decennal updated in 2015
Reference: Berger, J.-P., A. Leboeuf, and I. Pomerleau. 2015. Norme de stratification écoforestière - Quatrième inventaire écoforestier du Québec méridional. Québec.
Query: AN_ORIGINE = '2013' OR "AN_ORIGINE" = '2012' OR "AN_ORIGINE" = '2011' OR "AN_ORIGINE" = '2010' OR "AN_ORIGINE" >= '2009' OR "AN_ORIGINE" = '2008' OR "AN_ORIGINE" = '2007' OR "AN_ORIGINE" = '2006' OR "AN_ORIGINE" = '2005' OR "AN_ORIGINE" = '2004' OR "AN_ORIGINE" = '2003' OR "AN_ORIGINE" = '2002' OR "AN_ORIGINE" = '2001' OR "AN_ORIGINE" = '2000'

Definition: Proportion of the hunting ground (terrestrial area) covered by forest stands with broad-leaf tree species dominance.
Source: Photointerpreted ecoforest map, Quebec (Canada), 4th decennal updated in 2015
Reference: Berger, J.-P., A. Leboeuf, and I. Pomerleau. 2015. Norme de stratification écoforestière - Quatrième inventaire écoforestier du Québec méridional. Québec.

Definition: Proportion of hunting ground (terrestrial area) covered by forest stands with coniferous tree species dominance.
Source: Photointerpreted ecoforest map, Quebec (Canada), 4th decennal updated in 2015
Reference: Berger, J.-P., A. Leboeuf, and I. Pomerleau. 2015. Norme de stratification écoforestière - Quatrième inventaire écoforestier du Québec méridional. Québec.

Definition: Proportion of the hunting ground (terrestrial area) covered by forest stands with coniferous and broad-leaf tree species codominance.
Source: Photointerpreted ecoforest map, Quebec (Canada), 4th decennal updated in 2015
Reference: Berger, J.-P., A. Leboeuf, and I. Pomerleau. 2015. Norme de stratification écoforestière - Quatrième inventaire écoforestier du Québec méridional. Québec.

Definition: Proportion of the hunting ground (terrestrial area) covered by forest stands originating from plantations.
Source: Photointerpreted ecoforest map, Quebec (Canada), 4th decennal updated in 2015
Reference: Berger, J.-P., A. Leboeuf, and I. Pomerleau. 2015. Norme de stratification écoforestière - Quatrième inventaire écoforestier du Québec méridional. Québec.

Definition: Proportion of the hunting ground (terrestrial area) affected by windthrow.
Source: Photointerpreted ecoforest map, Quebec (Canada), 4th decennal updated in 2015
Reference: Berger, J.-P., A. Leboeuf, and I. Pomerleau. 2015. Norme de stratification écoforestière - Quatrième inventaire écoforestier du Québec méridional. Québec.

Definition: Proportion of the hunting ground (total area) free from industrial disturbances (mines, forestry, roads, towns)
Density of power lines on the hunting ground (total area) (km?km-2)
Source: Map of the hydroelectric infrastructures, Quebec (Canada)
Reference: Ministère des Ressources naturelles du Québec. 2019. La Base de données géographiques et administratives à l’échelle de 1/1 000 000.

Definition: Density of roads on the hunting ground (terrestrial area) (km?ha-1)
Reference: Ministère de l’Énergie et des Ressources naturelles du Québec. 2019. Adresses Québec. Quebec.

Definition: Density of main roads (paved or class 1) (terrestrial area) (km?km-2)
Source: Quebec (Canada) road geodatabase (QAReseau+) and validaton with the research team members from the communities
Reference: Ministère de l’Énergie et des Ressources naturelles du Québec. 2019. Adresses Québec. Quebec.

Factor: (""Cls_CheFor"" = '01' OR ""Cls_CheFor"" = 'HN' OR ""ClsRte"" = 'Nationale' OR ""Cls_RAT"" = 'CL1' OR ""Cls_RAT"" = 'HN' OR ""Cls_CheFor"" = 'NF' OR ""No_Chefor"" = 'R0804' )"

Definition: Distance between the hunting ground centroid and the nearest town (km), as the crow flies
Density of hunting cabin leases on the hunting ground (terrestrial area) (cabin?km-2)
Source: Map of leases provided by the Governmenet of Quebec (Canada) on public land
Reference: Ministère de l’Énergie et des Ressources naturelles du Québec. 2019. Adresses Québec. Quebec.
Query: "DE_PRECS_N" = 'Fins commerciales récréatives ou touristiques avec hébergement' OR

Factor: DE_PRECS_N"" = 'Fins communautaires, colonie de vacances' OR
DE_PRECS_N"" = 'Fins d''abri sommaire en forêt (plancher de 20 mètres carrés)' OR
DE_PRECS_N"" = 'Fins d''abri sommaire en forêt (plancher de 30 mètres carrés)' OR
DE_PRECS_N"" = 'Fins d''activités récréatives, sportives ou éducatives pour un usage communautaire sans but lucratif' OR
DE_PRECS_N"" = 'Fins d''hébergement dans une pourvoirie sans droits exclusifs' OR

Source: List and map (pdf) of abandanned mine sites under the responsibility of the Governement of Quebec (Canada). The data were combined with data owned by the Cree National Government.
Reference: Ministère de l’Énergie et des Ressources naturelles du Québec. 2015. Sites miniers abandonnés sous la responsabilité réelle de l’État.

Definition: Proportion of shoreline affected by windthrow
Source: The proportion of windthrow (Grn_win) in a 20m buffer on lakes and rivers
Reference: Natural Resouces Canada. 2015. Lakes, Rivers and Glaciers in Canada - CanVec Series - Hydrographic Features. CanVec Series.
